Dearborn, MI 48124
RE: License #: CB820201219
Keane Center For Adoption
930 Mason
Dearborn, MI 48124
Dear Mrs. Brail:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
12/03/2019. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Heather Reilly, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
22 Center Street
Ypsilanti, MI 48198
(734) 660-8309

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an ISEP violation. Please note that there
are additional ISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The
facility is in compliance with all additional ISEP requirements except for the
following:
This is a non-contracted agency and therefore not required to follow ISEP.
3.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a MDHHS Contract violation. Please note
that there are additional MDHHS Contract/Policy requirements that may not be
included in section 1. The facility is in compliance with all additional MDHHS
Contract/Policy requirements except for the following:
This is a non-contracted agency and therefore not required to follow MDHHS
policy.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance during this review.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation regarding possible staffing changes over the
next year and requirements for a home office.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans not related
to maltreatment during this licensing period.
4

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility continue on a regular license.
December 3, 2019
Heather Reilly Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
December 10, 2019
Claudia Triestram Date
Area Manager
